resources.string: Calendar_QA
Configure my Event
Reading permission on calendar is required to select a calendar and a writing permission for adding new events on it.
Add to my Calendar
Title
Title of the event
Location
Place where the event will be held
Description
Some details about the event
Start date
Date on which the event begins
Start time
Time on which the event begins
End date
Date on which the event ends
End time
Time on which the event ends
Minutes
Minutes prior to the event that the reminder should fire
The field cannot be empty.
The field cannot exceed the max number of characters.
Error
The start date and time should be before than the end date and time of the event.
The dates and times of the event are poorly written.
The calendar couldn\'t be selected. Verify that the Google Calendar App exists and it has at least a calendar.
The event id couldn\'t be parsed.
The event couldn\'t be added to the calendar.
The reminder couldn\'t be added to the event.
The input data couldn\'t be processed.
The minutes of the reminder are poorly written.
Ok
The event has been successfully added to your Google Calendar.
Back to home
